roleset.name: negotiate before something else
roleset.note: PRENEGOTIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pre-negotiate' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison to 'negotiate.' (from prenegotiate.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: other party arg 0 is negotiating with when separate mention

example.name: No deal mentioned, both negotiators in one mention
example.src: No deal mentioned, both negotiators in one mention
example.type: No deal mentioned, both negotiators in one mention
example.text: This standard agreement form pre-negotiated *none* by the two sides of the borrower and the lender will benefit both China and the U.S.
example.arg: by the two sides of the borrower and the lender
